titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Lords spiritual & temporal, in the Abby-Church at Westminster, on the 26th of Novemb. 1691 being the Thanksgiving-day for the preservation of Their Majesties, the success of their forces in the reducing of Ireland, and for the King's safe return / by ... Symon Lord Bishop of Ely.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of Ely's thanksgiving-sermon before the House of Lords.
